title: St. Paul of the Cross, C.P.
charism_focus: The core spirit: to preach the love of God revealed in the Passion of Jesus Christ.
relevance_to_moha: The Father and guide. His writings shape the spiritual life of the seminarians.

title: Our Lady of Sorrows
charism_focus: Central devotion of the Passionists. Meditation on Mary's role as co-sufferer at the foot of the Cross.
relevance_to_moha: A model of fidelity and discernment for all those in formation.

title: St. Gabriel of Our Lady of Sorrows, C.P.
charism_focus: Patron of youth and students. Known for his rapid ascent to holiness through devotion to Mary.
relevance_to_moha: An inspiration for the seminarians in their own intellectual and spiritual formation journey.

title: Blessed Dominic Barberi, C.P.
charism_focus: The great missionary and apostle of ecumenism. Received St. John Henry Newman into the Church.
relevance_to_moha: Highlights the missionary zeal essential for the Passionists in Kenya, Tanzania, and Mozambique.

title: St. Gemma Galgani
charism_focus: A mystic who lived the Passionist charism as a layperson. Patroness of the Vice-Province.
relevance_to_moha: A reminder that the Passionist charism is lived by all members of the wider Passionist Family.

title: Solemn Commemoration of the Passion
charism_focus: A special day to honor the foundational event of our Redemption.
relevance_to_moha: The liturgical peak of the Passionist year, underscoring the purpose of their life and study.
